items: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

blocks.name: Death Throes
blocks.text: When [name] dies, it explodes, and each creature within 30 feet of it must make a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw, taking dmg[20d6] fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The explosion ignites flammable objects in that area that aren't being worn or carried, and it destroys [name]'s weapons.

blocks.name: Fire Aura
blocks.text: At the start of each of [name]'s turns, each creature within 5 feet of it takes dmg[3d6] fire damage, and flammable objects in the aura that aren't being worn or carried ignite. A creature that touches [name] or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes dmg[3d6] fire damage.

blocks.name: Magic Resistance
blocks.text: [name] has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

blocks.name: Multiattack
blocks.text: [name] makes two attacks: one with its longsword and one with its whip.

blocks.name: Longsword
blocks.text: *Melee Weapon Attack:* atk[str] to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. *Hit:* dmg[3d8 + str] slashing damage plus dmg[3d8] lightning damage. If [name] scores a critical hit, it rolls damage dice three times, instead of twice.

blocks.name: Whip
blocks.text: *Melee Weapon Attack:* atk[fin] to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. *Hit:* dmg[2d6 + fin] slashing damage plus dmg[3d6] fire damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 20 Strength saving throw or be pulled up to 25 feet toward [name].

blocks.name: Teleport
blocks.text: [name] magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

blocks.name: Variant: Summon Demon (1/Day)
blocks.text:
The demon chooses what to summon and attempts a magical summoning.
  A balor has a 50 percent chance of summoning 1d8 vrocks, 1d6 hezrous, 1d4 glabrezus, 1d3 nalfeshnees, 1d2 mariliths, or one goristro.
  A summoned demon appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can't summon other demons. It remains for 1 minute, until it or its summoner dies, or until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

legendaryActions.description: [name] can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. [name] regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.
